overview: This ain't your mama's babysitter! These sitters don't just sit the kids! Gwen's reputation for being a slut really pays off! Destiny's cheerleading practice helped when she was getting pounded! Gia wanted to try some new positions so she could tell her friends she's the best! Kylie's an honor student who wasn't making the grades in sex, so she got some after school tutoring!
tagline: These Sitters Don't Just Sit The Kids!
title: The Babysitter 24
